title: Drawing, "Phaeton Asks Apollo to Drive the Sun Chariot", 1812
medium: Pen and ink, brush and brown watercolor wash on heavy paper
inscribed: Inscribed: Fetonte prega il suo padre Appollo che li facci guidare per un giorno il Carro del Sole.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Phaeton Asks Apollo to Drive the Sun Chariot", 1812.
1812. Pen and ink, brush and brown watercolor wash on heavy paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3284.
